job_details.Vacaturetitel: AI-First Software Engineer III, Trilogy (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
     * Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
     * Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
     * Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Routine Monotony: We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum so you can focus on creating innovative solutions.
     * Endless Meetings: We value your expertise in development over sitting in meeting rooms. Expect more coding, less talking., * Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.
job_details.full_text:
AI-First Software Engineer III, Trilogy (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

* Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
     * Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
     * Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
     * Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Routine Monotony: We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum so you can focus on creating innovative solutions.
     * Endless Meetings: We value your expertise in development over sitting in meeting rooms. Expect more coding, less talking., * Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on leveraging AI tools for productivity and enhancing existing products rather than core AI model development or deployment. It lacks specific details on building, fine-tuning, or deploying generative models or predictive systems, which are hallmarks of ML or GenAI Engineer roles.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the development and deployment of software, specifically back-end solutions and cloud-native applications, which falls under traditional software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.
job_tasks.justification: This involves integrating AI solutions into existing products, which requires software development skills to ensure seamless functionality and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
job_tasks.justification: Modernizing product lines and enhancing their performance and scalability through AI-driven innovations implies significant software development and architectural work.

job_tasks.phrase: Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.
job_tasks.justification: Code reviews and ensuring best practices are core activities within software development to maintain code quality and team standards.

job_tasks.phrase: Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of how AI tools can be applied to business processes (coding, development, bug fixing) to improve efficiency, aligning with business goals.

soft_skills.phrase: improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
